message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $10000. I think it's a great deal, considering its value to you is $8000. I'm willing to make a concession to make it more attractive for you. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9000 for the product?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $9500. It's still a great deal, considering its value to you is $8000. Let me know if you're willing to consider this revised offer!
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $8500 for the product?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $9200. It's still a good deal, considering its value to you is $8000. Let me know if you're willing to consider this revised offer!
